summary: Emit advisory backlog report grouped by plan

steps.title: Design advisory report tool
steps.notes: Define CLI to group fractal advisories from next-development backlog.

steps.title: Implement report generation and tests
steps.notes: Create tools.autonomy.advisory_report module with JSON/markdown output and regression tests.

steps.title: Produce latest advisory summary receipt
steps.notes: Run the tool against current backlog and store receipt for ND-020 triage.

checkpoint.description: Advisory backlog report grouped by plan is available as receipt
